champions-create-summary:
Summary used when creating a champion data module.
Parameters:
* %(full)s - full version format (#.#.#)
* %(short)s - short version format (#.#)
champions-revert-summary:
Summary used when reverting changes to bot-maintained data or when forced to downgrade.
Parameters:
* %(full)s - full version format (#.#.#)
* %(short)s - short version format (#.#)
champions-update-summary:
Summary used when updating a champion data module.
Parameters:
* %(full)s - full version format (#.#.#)
* %(short)s - short version format (#.#)
champions-create-list-summary:
Summary used when creating a list with champion data.
Parameters:
* %(full)s - full version format (#.#.#)
* %(short)s - short version format (#.#)
champions-revert-list-summary:
Summary used when reverting changes to bot-maintained data list or when forced to downgrade.
Parameters:
* %(full)s - full version format (#.#.#)
* %(short)s - short version format (#.#)
champions-update-list-summary:
Summary used when updating a list with champion data.
Parameters:
* %(full)s - full version format (#.#.#)
* %(short)s - short version format (#.#)
champions-create-keys-summary: Summary used when creating a list of keys/aliases.
champions-update-keys-summary: Summary used when updating a list of keys/aliases.
champions-create-skills-summary: Summary used when creating a list of skill names.
champions-update-skills-summary: Summary used when updating a list of skill names.
champions-create-updates-summary: Summary used when creating a list of last update version per character
champions-update-updates-summary: Summary used when updating a list of last update version per character
